SectionBody.Text: The following provisions apply to group health insurance, blanket health insurance, and franchise health insurance:

Subsection.Text: Section 627.569, relating to use of dividends, refunds, rate reductions, commissions, and service fees.
Section 627.602(1)(f) and (2), relating to identification numbers and statement of deductible provisions.
Section 627.638, relating to direct payment for hospital or medical services.
Section 627.640, relating to filing and classification of rates.
Section 627.613, relating to timely payment of claims, or s. 627.6131, relating to payment of claims, whichever is applicable.
Section 627.645(1), relating to denial of claims.
Section 627.6471, relating to preferred provider organizations.
Section 627.6472, relating to exclusive provider organizations.
Section 627.6473, relating to combined preferred provider and exclusive provider policies.
Section 627.64731, relating to leasing, renting, or granting access to a participating provider.
Section 627.6044, relating to the use of specific methodology for payment of claims.
Section 627.6405, relating to the inappropriate utilization of emergency care.
